title: Amazon Essentials Men's Skinny-Fit Stretch Jean
description: SKINNY FIT: Snug fit through hip, thigh, and leg; sits below the waist.
LIGHT-STRETCH DENIM: Mid-weight cotton denim with a bit of stretch for all-day comfort. Comes in indigo denim washes or solid colors with a garment wash for a lived in denim-inspired look.
SKINNY JEAN: With classic, five-pocket denim styling, our skinniest fit jean is ideal for everyday wear.

DETAILS: Features zippered fly with metal button fly closure, bartack reinforcements, and rivets at front hand pockets. With stretch denim, it is always recommended to hang to dry for an extended garment life.

Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men's must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
